items.sentence: I soon got accustomed to speaking in public.
I think Tom and Mary were talking in French.
Tom bends over backwards to make Mary happy.
Tom called Mary a couple of times last week.
I wanted Tom to have a copy of my new novel.
I wanted to be the one to tell Tom the news.
I wanted to be the one who did that for you.
I wanted to buy a book to read on the plane.
I wanted to say thank you for all your help.
What kind of music do you usually listen to?
Who would want to live in a place like this?
Tom and Mary watched the fireworks together.
Tell us what you know about Tom\'s problems.
I can\'t put up with his insults any longer.
I can\'t remember what question I asked him.
I can\'t remember where I put my sunglasses.
I can\'t seem to focus on work at all today.
Tom has been looking forward to meeting you.
Tom has been my best friend for a long time.
I can\'t forgive him for behaving like that.
